known_issues: Users module: all users saved with same principal_id, causing overwrites
Users list only shows most recently saved user due to principal_id collision

existing_features.title: Ensure principal_id is unique for each authenticated user by capturing the actual logged-in principal from Internet Identity when a user completes profile setup, and storing it correctly in the backend without duplication
When creating a new user manually from the Users module, do not assign the current logged-in user's principal_id; instead, leave principal_id empty or generate a temporary unique placeholder value
Fix the Users list query to fetch and display all user records from the database without filtering or collapsing duplicates caused by principal_id collisions

new_feature_requests.summary: Ensure the backend always inserts new user records instead of overwriting existing ones, so that multiple users can coexist in the database without collision
